channel.title: curl on ssatosays/blog
channel.description: Recent content in curl on ssatosays/blog

item.title: curlコマンドチートシート #27
item.description: GET curl http://localhost:3000/entry POST curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"Name":"name", "Age":"100"}' http://localhost:3000/entry PUTなどのその他のHTTPメソッド curl -X PUT -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"Name":"name", "Age":"100"}' http://localhost:3000/entry ヘッダーの追加 curl -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" http://localhost:3000/secure-entry レスポンスヘッダーの表示 curl -i http://localhost:3000/entry
